verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>speaks<s%> <S%G4490>expressly,<s%> that in the <S%G5305>latter<s%> <S%G5550>times<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> shall <S%G868>depart<s%> from the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> giving <S%G4337>heed<s%> to <S%G4108>seducing<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> and <S%G1319>doctrines<s%> of <S%G1140>devils;<s%>
<S%G5573>Speaking<s%> <S%G5573>lies<s%> in <S%G5272>hypocrisy;<s%> having their <S%G4893>conscience<s%> <S%G2743>seared<s%> with a <S%G2743>hot<s%> iron;

<S%G2967>Forbidding<s%> to <S%G1060>marry,<s%> and commanding to <S%G567>abstain<s%> from <S%G1033>meats,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2936>created<s%> to be <S%G3336>received<s%> with <S%G2169>thanksgiving<s%> of them which <S%G4103>believe<s%> and <S%G1921>know<s%> the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

For <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2938>creature<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2570>good,<s%> and <S%G3762>nothing<s%> to be <S%G579>refused,<s%> if it be <S%G2983>received<s%> with <S%G2169>thanksgiving:<s%>
For it is <S%G37>sanctified<s%> by the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G1783>prayer.<s%>

If you <S%G5294>put<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%> in <S%G5294>remembrance<s%> of <S%G5023>these<s%> things, you shall be a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1789>nourished<s%> up in the <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> and of <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine,<s%> <S%G3739>whereunto<s%> you have <S%G3877>attained.<s%>

For <S%G4984>bodily<s%> <S%G1129>exercise<s%> <S%G5624>profits<s%> <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3641>little:<s%> but <S%G2150>godliness<s%> is <S%G5624>profitable<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> things, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%> of the <S%G2222>life<s%> that <S%G3568>now<s%> is, and of that which is to <S%G3195>come.<s%>

For <S%G1519>therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> we <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G2872>labor<s%> and suffer <S%G3679>reproach,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> we <S%G1679>trust<s%> in the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is the <S%G4990>Savior<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G3122>specially<s%> of those that <S%G4103>believe.<s%>

Let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G2706>despise<s%> your <S%G3503>youth;<s%> but be you an <S%G5179>example<s%> of the <S%G4103>believers,<s%> in <S%G3056>word,<s%> in <S%G391>conversation,<s%> in <S%G26>charity,<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> in <S%G4102>faith,<s%> in <S%G47>purity.<s%>

<S%G272>Neglect<s%> not the <S%G5486>gift<s%> that is in you, <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> you by <S%G4394>prophecy,<s%> with the <S%G1936>laying<s%> <S%G1936>on<s%> of the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of the <S%G4244>presbytery.<s%>

<S%G3191>Meditate<s%> on <S%G5023>these<s%> things; <S%G2468>give<s%> yourself <S%G1510>wholly<s%> <S%G1722><s%> to them; that your <S%G4297>profiting<s%> may <S%G5318>appear<s%> <S%G5600><s%> to <S%G3956>all.<s%>

Take <S%G1907>heed<s%> to <S%G4572>yourself,<s%> and to the <S%G1319>doctrine;<s%> <S%G1961>continue<s%> in them: for in <S%G4160>doing<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> you shall <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G4572>yourself,<s%> and them that <S%G191>hear<s%> you.
